title: 2016 SKT T1 Skins
body: So I recently purchased some RP, solely to purchase an SKT Ekko skin, however it was not in the store when I went to purchase it. Are the 2016 SKT T1 skins limited edition? If not, why were they removed from the store?

replies.body: The SKT skins are in fact [**Legacy Skins**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752944). They've already left the store for now, but there's always a chance of getting them from Hextech Chests!
